skills.name: Arrow of Iron
skills.description: Deals damage to a single target and reduce the targetâ€™s attack, defense and health for 5 seconds. Next, deals damage in a front-facing cone to up to 5 enemies and reduces their attack, defense and health for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Thunderous Force
skills.description: Counterattack damage against your troops is reduced. When actively attacking, you have a 10% chance to reduce the movement speed of enemy cavalry and the movement speed of other troops. Slow effect lasts 3 rounds.

skills.name: Synergy
skills.description: All troops under your command gain attack against Barbarians and other neutral units, and all Commanders get EXP bonus.

skills.name: Fortress of Mercia
skills.description: When this Commander leads a rally attack, all armies joining the rally have higher troop limit. When this Commander is leading at least 3 different troop types, their damage is increased.

skills.name: Warrior Queen
skills.description: Deal an extra 20% damage to enemies who have been slowed.
